title: Jodie's chicken sandwich filler
ingredients: ['2 to 3 cooked chicken breast fillets, finely diced', '1 red pepper, finely diced or sliced', '1 green pepper, finely diced or sliced', '1 onion, finely sliced', '1 large tomato, finely diced', '1/2 Mattesons smoked pork sausage, finely diced', '100g grated Cheddar cheese', '2 to 3 large tablespoons garlic mayonnaise']
